effects.effect: Choose one of the following abilities.

features.name: Sticky Bomb
features.flavor: Explosives are best when they're attached to an enemy.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: You attach a small bomb to a creature. If you are hidden from the creature, they don't notice the bomb and you remain hidden. The creature otherwise notices the bomb and can disarm and remove it as a main action. If they don't, at the end of your next turn, the bomb detonates. When the bomb detonates, you make a power roll targeting each enemy within 2 squares of it.

###### Stink Bomb (5 Insight)

*Putrid yellow gas explodes from a bomb you toss.*
